io.github.acashjos.anarch

Class RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.acashjos.anarch.RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint
  • Enclosing class:
    RegexValueMatchBuilder

    public class RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint
extends java.lang.Object
    Blueprint for values to be extracted corresponding to each regex pattern enlisted using builder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PatternBlueprint(java.lang.String pattern, int group, RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint parent)
      constructor #2 for subpatterns
      PatternBlueprint(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String pattern)
      constructor #1 for main patterns

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint addSubTest(java.lang.String pattern, int source_group)
      Adds a new regex pattern to the lookup list within the parent RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint scope This creates and returns a new RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint Object, insert it into pattern set and returns the object Subpatterns are matched only once, equivalent to calling doOnce() Subpatterns defined on a subpattern will be ignored
      RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint addTest(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String pattern)
      Calls RegexValueMatchBuilder.addTest(String, String) Adds a new regex pattern to the lookup list.
      RegexValueMatchBuilder close()
      Returns the MatchBuilder Object
      RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint doOnce()
      match the pattern only once.
      RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint set(java.lang.String key, int group)
      Sets key in Output JSON to value corresponding to backreference group number from pattern match

    • Method Detail

      • doOnce

        public RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint doOnce()
        match the pattern only once. If the pattern is recurring, only the first occurrence is matched.

      • addTest

        public RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint addTest(java.lang.String id,
                                                       java.lang.String pattern)
        Calls RegexValueMatchBuilder.addTest(String, String) Adds a new regex pattern to the lookup list. This creates and returns a new RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint Object, insert it into pattern set and returns the object
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier for this pattern. If the pattern matches multiple elements, the extracted value branch will be a JSONArray with this id as key
        pattern - the pattern to match on the target string
        Returns:
        RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint Object, for chaining

      • addSubTest

        public RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint addSubTest(java.lang.String pattern,
                                                          int source_group)
        Adds a new regex pattern to the lookup list within the parent RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint scope This creates and returns a new RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint Object, insert it into pattern set and returns the object Subpatterns are matched only once, equivalent to calling doOnce() Subpatterns defined on a subpattern will be ignored
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to match on the target string
        source_group - backreference from the parent patten match to be used as the target string for this sub pattern to test
        Returns:
        RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint Object, for chaining

      • set

        public RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint set(java.lang.String key,
                                                   int group)
        Sets key in Output JSON to value corresponding to backreference group number from pattern match
        Parameters:
        key - the key to which the value is to be set in the output
        group - backreference group number from pattern match
        Returns:
        this, for chaining

      • close

        public RegexValueMatchBuilder close()
        Returns the MatchBuilder Object
        Returns:
        RegexValueMatchBuilder object containing list of all the RegexValueMatchBuilder.PatternBlueprint objects
